FuncDef:
The multiplex mode command sets the AUG multiplexing mode.
The undo multiplex mode command restores the default setting.
By default, au-4 is used.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the AUG multiplexing mode is AU-4.
-

Indicates that the AUG multiplexing mode is AU-3.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In SDH, payload has two mapping or multiplexing solutions:
ANSI: The multiplexing solution of ANSI is AU-3.ETSI: the multiplexing solution of ETSI is AU-4.
When CPOS is applied in SDH mode, only the default AU-4 multiplexing mode can be used. An error message is displayed when you attempt to set the AU-3 multiplexing mode.

Precautions
The AU-3 multiplex mode is only supported on CR53-P10-2xcPOS/STM1-SFP subCard.
